channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- InfoSphere Information Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- InfoSphere Information Server

item.title: CVE-2020-4632|2024-09-17T01:01:25.203Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Metadata Asset Manager 11.7 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery. By sending a specially crafted request, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to submit or control server requests. IBM X-Force ID: 185416.

item.title: CVE-2017-1469|2024-09-17T03:18:39.402Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 9.1, 11.3, and 11.5 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges by placing arbitrary files in installation directories. IBM X-Force ID: 128468.

item.title: CVE-2019-4237|2024-09-17T01:06:03.666Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: A Cross-Frame Scripting vulnerability in IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 can allow an attacker to load the vulnerable application inside an HTML iframe tag on a malicious page. IBM X-Force ID: 159419.

item.title: CVE-2021-29875|2024-09-17T00:36:25.730Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information due to a insecure third party domain access vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 206572.

item.title: CVE-2017-1350|2024-09-17T04:29:22.425Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 9.1, 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 could allow a user to escalate their privileges to administrator due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 126526.

item.title: CVE-2022-22427|2024-09-17T00:26:55.885Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 223720.

item.title: CVE-2020-4740|2024-09-17T02:26:33.301Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.5 and 11.7 is vulnerable to HTML injection. A remote attacker could inject malicious HTML code, which when viewed, would be executed in the victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting site. IBM X-Force ID: 188150.

item.title: CVE-2017-1495|2024-09-17T03:38:30.699Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 9.1, 11.3, and 11.5 could allow a privileged user to cause a memory dump that could contain highly sensitive information including access credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 128693.

item.title: CVE-2018-1906|2024-09-17T00:35:41.134Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7could allow an authenticated user to download code using a specially crafted HTTP request. IBM X-Force ID: 152663.

item.title: CVE-2018-1994|2024-09-17T04:05:09.306Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.5 and 11.7 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 154494.

item.title: CVE-2022-22322|2024-09-17T02:27:08.039Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 218370.

item.title: CVE-2020-4727|2024-09-17T01:10:38.596Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim.

item.title: CVE-2018-1845|2024-09-17T04:04:05.975Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 150905.

item.title: CVE-2020-4298|2024-09-17T02:07:02.493Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 176475.

item.title: CVE-2020-4741|2024-09-17T00:51:23.253Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.5 and 11.7 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 188197.

item.title: CVE-2022-22441|2024-09-17T01:06:00.629Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated user to view information of higher privileged users and groups due to a privilege escalation vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 224426.

item.title: CVE-2019-4238|2024-09-17T01:36:59.663Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 159464.

item.title: CVE-2022-35715|2024-09-17T02:48:06.822Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in a stack trace. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 231202.

item.title: CVE-2021-38887|2024-09-17T00:37:19.657Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from application response requests that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 209401.

item.title: CVE-2018-1432|2024-09-17T01:05:56.077Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 9.1, 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-frame scripting which is a vulnerability that allows an attacker to load Information Server components inside an HTML iframe tag on a malicious page. The attacker could use this weakness to devise a Clickjacking attack to conduct phishing, frame sniffing, social engineering or Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 139360.

item.title: CVE-2020-4997|2024-09-17T00:10:38.364Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 192914

item.title: CVE-2017-1467|2024-09-17T01:05:52.639Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: A network layer security vulnerability in InfoSphere Information Server 9.1, 11.3, and 11.5 can lead to privilege escalation or unauthorized access. IBM X-Force ID: 128466.

item.title: CVE-2018-1895|2024-09-17T04:10:32.865Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 152159.

item.title: CVE-2019-4257|2024-09-17T03:34:10.731Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.5 and 11.7 is affected by an information disclosure vulnerability. Sensitive information in an error message may be used to conduct further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 159945.

item.title: CVE-2021-29681|2024-09-17T00:21:54.687Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information by injecting parameters into an HTML query. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 199918.

item.title: CVE-2018-1701|2024-09-17T01:35:50.582Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenciated user under specialized conditions to inject commands into the installation process that would execute on the WebSphere Application Server. IBM X-Force ID: 145970.

item.title: CVE-2017-1468|2024-09-17T03:52:54.206Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 9.1, 11.3, and 11.5 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges by placing arbitrary files in installation directories. IBM X-force ID: 128467.

item.title: CVE-2023-35022|2024-08-24T10:47:55.975Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a local user to update projects that they do not have the authorization to access. IBM X-Force ID: 258254.

item.title: CVE-2024-40704|2024-08-15T17:35:25.483Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a privileged user to obtain sensitive information from authentication request headers. IBM X-Force ID: 298277.

item.title: CVE-2024-39751|2024-08-06T15:37:42.531Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 297429

item.title: CVE-2024-40689|2024-08-02T04:33:11.877Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 297719.

item.title: CVE-2024-31898|2024-08-02T01:59:50.480Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated user to read or modify sensitive information by bypassing authentication using insecure direct object references. IBM X-Force ID: 288182.

item.title: CVE-2024-31902|2024-08-02T01:59:50.069Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 289234.

item.title: CVE-2024-40689|2024-07-26T13:27:26.097Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 297719.
